summary: This document consists of multiple photo sheet forms from the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York documenting a possible suicide attempt by inmate Nicholas Tartaglione on July 23, 2019. The forms were completed by a Lieutenant in the Special Investigative Section following the incident in the Special Housing Unit.

persons.name: Nicholas Tartaglione
persons.context: Inmate at Metropolitan Correctional Center who was involved in a possible suicide attempt in his cell on July 23, 2019.

persons.name: Lieutenant
persons.context: Unnamed Lieutenant at Metropolitan Correctional Center who photographed the incident scene and completed the photo sheet documentation.

events.title: Possible Suicide Attempt by Nicholas Tartaglione
events.description: Inmate Nicholas Tartaglione attempted or was involved in a possible suicide attempt in his cell at the Metropolitan Correctional Center's Special Housing Unit.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York, N.Y.
Special Housing Unit, Metropolitan Correctional Center
keyFacts: Nicholas Tartaglione was involved in a possible suicide attempt at Metropolitan Correctional Center on July 23, 2019 at 1:27 AM.
The incident occurred in the Special Housing Unit of the prison.
A Lieutenant from the Special Investigative Section documented the incident with photographs taken at 2:25 AM.
The document consists of multiple photo sheet forms with identical information, suggesting multiple copies or versions were created.
